org.redpin.android.net
Class InternetConnectionManager

java.lang.Object
  android.content.Context
      android.content.ContextWrapper
          android.app.Service
              org.redpin.android.net.InternetConnectionManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
ComponentCallbacks
public class InternetConnectionManager
extends Service

The InternetConnectionManager provides information about the connectivity to the Redpin server. It does so by checking the devices current network state but also contacting the server directly.

Author:
Arno Fiva (fivaa@student.ethz.ch)

Nested Class Summary
private  class InternetConnectionManager.ConnectivityChecker
          AsyncTask responsible for explicitly checking the connection to the Redpin server by simply opening a socket to it and closing it again.
